entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:10 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -18.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
